summary: An internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, forwarding a rumor that journalist Julie Brown has heard about the imminent unsealing of four indictments against co-conspirators in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Julie Brown
persons.context: Mentioned as the source of a rumor that four indictments against co-conspirators are to be unsealed.

events.title: Email about Rumored Indictments
events.description: An email is sent within the U.S. Attorney's Office forwarding a rumor from journalist Julie Brown about the imminent unsealing of four indictments against co-conspirators.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
It forwards a rumor from journalist Julie Brown about legal action.
The rumor claims four indictments against co-conspirators in the Epstein case are to be unsealed the following week.
The email is dated December 11, 2019, indicating ongoing investigative activity at that time.
